mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.ACCOUNT_ID2, B.CONTENT, B.CHAT_DATE, C.CHAT_ID FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CHAT_ID ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC) AS ROW1 , A.* FROM CHAT_HISTORY A ) B , CHAT C WHERE B.ROW1 = 1 AND B.CHAT_ID = C.CHAT_ID AND C.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} AND C.CHAT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.CHAT_STATUS2 = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT C.ACCOUNT_ID, B.CONTENT, B.CHAT_DATE, C.CHAT_ID FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CHAT_ID ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC) AS ROW1 , A.* FROM CHAT_HISTORY A ) B , CHAT C WHERE B.ROW1 = 1 AND B.CHAT_ID = C.CHAT_ID AND C.ACCOUNT_ID2 = #{accountId} AND C.CHAT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.CHAT_STATUS2 = 'Y' ) ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC
SELECT CH.CHAT_HISTORY_ID , CH.CHAT_ID , CH.ACCOUNT_ID , CH.CONTENT , CH.CHAT_DATE , CH.STATUS , C.ACCOUNT_ID2 FROM CHAT_HISTORY CH JOIN CHAT C ON(CH.CHAT_ID = C.CHAT_ID) WHERE CH.CHAT_ID = #{chatId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_HISTORY ( CHAT_HISTORY_ID , CHAT_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CONTENT , CHAT_DATE , STATUS , NOTICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_HISTORY_ID.NEXTVAL , #{chatId} , #{accountId} , #{content} , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_ID2 , CHAT_STATUS , CHAT_STATUS2 ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_ID.NEXTVAL , #{accountId} , #{accountId2} , DEFUALT , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_ID2 , CHAT_STATUS , CHAT_STATUS2 FROM CHAT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} AND ACCOUNT_ID2 = #{accountId2}
